alert.note: Alert for Daviess; Gibson; Knox; Pike (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 09 at 9:20PM EST until March 11 at 6:36AM EST by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Indiana... East Fork White River near Bedford, at Williams, and near Rivervale. White River at Hazleton, Edwardsport, and Petersburg. .Minor flooding is ongoing across southern Indiana due to widespread 2 to 3 inches of rainfall that fell Friday March 3rd. Flooding is expected to end Saturday on the East Fork White River, although minor flooding is expected to persist on lower portions of the White River well into next week with additional rain expected tonight and again this weekend. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...White River at Edwardsport. * WHEN...Until Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.6 feet, INDOT may close SR 358 between SR 67 at Edwardsport to SR 57 at Plainville due to flooding. SR 358 floods on the east side of the river between the levees. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM EST Thursday /6:00 PM CST Thursday/ the stage was 18.9 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 7:00 PM EST Thursday /6:00 PM CST Thursday/ was 20.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 6.8 feet Sunday, March 19. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/ind. This statement will be updated within the next 12 to 24 hours.
